00060 void BdkPdfCBShape::init(const char * theName,
00061                        const char * theDesc,
00062                        RooRealVar & dependent) {
00063   baseInit(theName, theDesc);
00064   setDependent(dependent);
00065   initParameters();
00066 }
00067 
00068 void BdkPdfCBShape::setDependent(RooRealVar & dependent) {
00069   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00070   _dependent = &dependent;
00071 }
00072 
00073 void BdkPdfCBShape::initParameters() {
00074   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00075   
00076   // now define the RooVars. The default parameters are good 
00077   // for missing mass:
00078   _m0 = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".m0" ,"m0" , 1);
00079   
00080   _sigma = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".sigma" ,"sigma", 1);
00081 
00082   _alpha = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".alpha" ,"alpha", 1);
00083 
00084   _enne = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".enne" ,"enne", 1);
00085 
00086   ((RooRealVar*)_m0)->setConstant(kFALSE);  
00087   ((RooRealVar*)_sigma)->setConstant(kFALSE);
00088   ((RooRealVar*)_alpha)->setConstant(kFALSE);
00089   ((RooRealVar*)_enne)->setConstant(kFALSE);
00090 
00091   // give resonable errors as first steps
00092   ((RooRealVar*)_m0)->setError(0.05);
00093   ((RooRealVar*)_sigma)->setError(0.05);
00094   ((RooRealVar*)_alpha)->setError(0.05);
00095   ((RooRealVar*)_enne)->setError(0.05);
00096 }
00097 
00098 
00099 void BdkPdfCBShape::createPdf() {  
00100   _thePdf =
00101     new RooCBShape(TString(GetName())+".pdf", TString(GetTitle()) + " CBShape",
00102                    *_dependent, *_m0, *_sigma, *_alpha, *_enne);
00103   setIsValid(kTRUE);
00104 }
00105 
00106 RooArgSet BdkPdfCBShape::dependents() {
00107   return RooArgSet(*_dependent);
00108 }
00109 
00110 void BdkPdfCBShape::linkParameters(const BdkPdfCBShape & pdf2) {
00111   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00112   linkParameters(pdf2._m0, pdf2._sigma, pdf2._alpha, pdf2._enne);
00113 }
00114 
00115 void BdkPdfCBShape::linkParameters(RooAbsReal *m0,
00116                                    RooAbsReal *sigma, 
00117                                    RooAbsReal *alpha, 
00118                                    RooAbsReal *enne){
00119   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00120   if ( m0 != 0 ) { _m0= m0;}
00121   if ( sigma != 0 ) { _sigma = sigma;} 
00122   if ( alpha != 0 ) { _alpha = alpha;} 
00123   if ( enne != 0 ) { _enne = enne;} 
00124 }
